Uses of Class
imagingbook.lib.image.access.ImageAccessor

  • Packages that use ImageAccessor 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.lib.image  
    imagingbook.lib.image.access  

    • Uses of ImageAccessor in imagingbook.lib.image

      Methods in imagingbook.lib.image with parameters of type ImageAccessor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ImageMapper.map​(ImageAccessor sourceAcc, ImageAccessor targetAcc)
      Transforms the source image to the target image using this geometric mapping and the specified pixel interpolation method.

    • Uses of ImageAccessor in imagingbook.lib.image.access

      Subclasses of ImageAccessor in imagingbook.lib.image.access 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ByteAccessor
      Image accessor for scalar images with 8-bit (byte) values.
      class  FloatAccessor
      Image accessor for scalar images with 32-bit (float) values.
      class  RgbAccessor
      A specific vector-valued image accessor for RGB images (direct subclass of VectorAccessor).
      class  ScalarAccessor
      The common (abstract) super-class for all image accessors to scalar-valued images.
      class  ShortAccessor
      Image accessor for scalar images with 16-bit (short) values.
      class  VectorAccessor
      Accessor for vector-valued images with arbitrary depth (number of components).
      Methods in imagingbook.lib.image.access that return ImageAccessor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ImageAccessor ImageAccessor.create​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip)
      Creates a new ImageAccessor instance for the given image, using the default out-of-bounds strategy and interpolation methods.
      static ImageAccessor ImageAccessor.create​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs, InterpolationMethod ipm)
      Creates a new ImageAccessor instance for the given image, using the specified out-of-bounds strategy and interpolation methods.
